content:
Hello All,
I have done mapping of FT1 with ChargeItem when FT1-6 == "CG" (Charge).
However, in case of other values in FT1-6 i.e. (Credit, Payment, Co-payment etc), I don't find it relevant to use ChargeItem resource.
Request your feedback on this if that's the correct understanding.
Thanks

Hello All,
I have done mapping of FT1 with ChargeItem when FT1-6 == "CG" (Charge).
However, in case of other values in FT1-6 i.e. (Credit, Payment, Co-payment etc), I don't find it relevant to use ChargeItem resource.
Request your feedback on this if that's the correct understanding.
Thanks
I think you might have meant to post this in #financial. I've moved it there for you.
This topic was moved here from #fmg > FT1 mapping to FHIR resource by Lloyd McKenzie
Thanks @Lloyd McKenzie , I have posted in financial group as well but there was no response so thought of posting it in fmg group.
FMG is for management of FHIR publications, quality rules, etc. We don't generally deal with domain-specific questions.

@MaryKay McDaniel @Paul Knapp - can you help @Ankita Srivastava?
Alternatively, you could ask on the #v2 to FHIR stream.

Hi @Ankita Srivastava ,
can you give us more information? What are you trying to do? There are other FHIR Resources available, and work being done for R5. More information around your use case would help us help you!
Thanks!
FM Co-chair

Thank you @MaryKay McDaniel for the response.
I am doing FT1 mapping based on FT1-6 value:

  1. If FT1-6 = "CG" -> map to ChargeItem
  2. if FT1-6 is in ("CD", "PY") (where patient has deposited the amount or made payment already) -> which resource should I use?
